title: AOC 24B2H2 24” Frameless IPS Monitor, FHD 1920x1080, 100Hz, 106% sRGB, for Home and Office, HDMI x2, Low Blue Mode, VESA Compatible, Black
description: The AOC 24B2H2 is a 24-inch B2 series monitor with vivid imagery and all the essentials you need for home, office, and gaming. It features a slim profile and a 3-sided borderless panel for a modern, sleek design and seamless multi-monitor setup. Thanks to the IPS 178/178 degree extra wide viewing angle, you can witness FHD resolution and consistent colors from a wide range of viewing angles, with up to 106% sRGB color gamut area coverage. Whether you’re working on documents, playing games, or watching movies, you’ll enjoy all your content in superbly detailed full quality and brilliant colors. The 100Hz refresh rate delivers smooth, fluid scenes. Whether you're catching up on your favorite TV series, watching a video or 4K ultra HD movie, or playing a game, you can enjoy all of your entertainment without lag or ghosting effects. The included stand is tilt adjustable to provide each user with an optimal viewing angle for comfort during extended gaming and computing sessions. The monitor is also VESA compatible, allowing you to quickly change to another type of mounting solution. All AOC monitors guaranteed are covered by a three-year warranty, starting from the original date of purchase.
